Privacy Policy

1. Data We Collect: Account identifiers (name, email, optional mobile), profile details you edit, budget/transaction entries you save, and app analytics (crash + performance).
2. How We Use It: To display balances, budgets, insights, and to send notifications you opt into. We do not sell your data.
3. Storage & Security: Data is stored in app storage/your linked services and protected via encryption in transit. Keep your device secure.
4. Sharing: Only with providers required to run the app (analytics, auth, database). No third-party marketing sharing.
5. Your Choices: You can update profile data, revoke notification permission, or request deletion from Settings > Account.
6. Children: Not intended for users under 16.

Terms & Conditions

1. Acceptance: Using BudgetBoss means you accept these terms.
2. Financial Responsibility: Insights are informational; you remain responsible for your financial decisions.
3. Availability: Features may change; uptime is not guaranteed.
4. Liability: We are not liable for losses arising from app use.
5. User Conduct: Do not upload illegal content or infringe on others' rights.
6. Termination: We may restrict access for misuse or security reasons.
7. Contact: For questions or deletion requests, reach support within the app.
